title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services

faqs.question: How do I book an appointment?
faqs.answer: You can book an appointment through our online portal or by calling our reception desk. Visit our appointment section to select your preferred doctor and time slot.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: Appointments can be cancelled up to 24 hours before the scheduled time. Cancellations made less than 24 hours in advance may incur a cancellation fee.

faqs.question: Do you accept insurance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we accept most major insurance plans. Please contact our billing department for more information about accepted insurance providers.

faqs.question: What documents should I bring?
faqs.answer: Please bring your ID, insurance card, and any relevant medical records or test results from previous doctors.

faqs.question: Are emergency services available 24/7?
faqs.answer: Yes, our emergency department is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week for urgent medical care.
